rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0001
rows.name:
Before we leaving, Tora want to explain
something to Boss and Hana!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0002
rows.name: Explain what, Masterpon?

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0003
rows.name: It about this advanced gaming device!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0004
rows.name:
I did wonder what that thing was for.
So it's for playing games?

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0005
rows.name: Yes! Game is called Tiger! Tiger!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0006
rows.name:
Is hidden gem that Grampypon make
for Tora when Tora was littlepon!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0007
rows.name: It looks like it's seen better days...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0008
rows.name:
Tora turned on power just now,
so should be possible to play!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0009
rows.name: Boss! Give game a try!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0010
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0011
rows.name:
It does sound kind of fun, but I
wouldn't want to get hooked on
a game while Nia needs rescuing...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0012
rows.name: Wait wait wait!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0013
rows.name:
Playing this game can earn prizes!
Special parts for power up Hana!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0014
rows.name: Parts for Hana?

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0015
rows.name:
Grampypon make this game in hopes
that it reveal true purpose when Hana
finally complete!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0016
rows.name:
So if friends think Hana a bit weak,
or just want more amazing power,
play game and get new upgrade!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0017
rows.name:
I...guess that makes sense.
I'll give it a go, then.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0018
rows.name: That is wise decision!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0019
rows.name: Tiger! Tiger! GO!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0020
rows.name:
Shall Tora explain basics? After all, 
Boss is a little wet behind ears...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0021
rows.name:
Use directional buttons to move!
Use A Button to attack!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0022
rows.name:
So, that is basics. Tora let boss
figure out rest by Rex's self!
Learning is best by doing, meh!
